thread.section_title: ALittleLuxury.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ALittleLuxury.com.au | alittleluxury.com.au
thread.title: Gillian Wright

author: Gillian Wright
title: Gillian Wright
text:
I ordered an item from A Little Luxury.com.au for my granddaughter's 21st birthday. I live in England and my granddaughter lives in Australia. The delivery was a little early, but it was still a lovely surprise for my granddaughter. I did not see it, but my granddaughter was very pleased with it and e-mailed me to let me know it had arrived. When you live a long distance away from family it's good to know that there are companies out there you can rely on to send what you want, and when you want it.
I will definitely go to this company again. Ordering was very easy and they have a lot of gifts to choose from.
